title: **** For Sale T2o6's HoF SLers Off-Backs ****

posts.post_title: **** For Sale T2o6's HoF SLers Off-Backs ****
posts.post_content:
For the binder, Fun lot of low grade authentic t206s. 
Will entertain offers ("sold" takes precedence)

HoF Clarke $199
SLer Lipe $199
SLer Helm $199
Old Mill Gibson $175 (print group 1, toughest back, only 7 graded psa) SOLD
Sovereign Ames $59 SOLD
Sovereign Wilson $35 SOLD
Portrait Stovall $59
"How about a hug?" Ritter $59
Beals Becker $99 (almost impossible w off-back, Sweet Caporal 350/25 next best thing, only 7 graded psa)  SOLD

$ ppff
Ships bubble mailer w/tracking

*Clarke has some type of shellac on front but still looks great
*Lipe Helm Ritter Stovall guessing trimmed 

-Ryan

Becker is Sold
